name: .RDSAVE
summary: Learn about .RDSAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You should not attempt to open RDSAVE files. Instead, 7th Beat Games Rhythm Doctor references RDSAVE files and loads their information.

Since RDSAVE files are saved in plain text, you can open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (macOS). However, incorrectly editing the file may corrupt the save file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rdsave file in Microsoft Notepad 11
images.caption: RDSAVE file open in Microsoft Notepad 11
